snippet: The police have arrested a male suspect in a string of random Kansas City-area highway shootings that have wounded three people.
abstract: Police arrest man in string of random Kansas City-area highway shootings that have wounded three people.
lead_paragraph: The police have arrested a male suspect in a string of random Kansas City-area highway shootings that have wounded three people.

headline.main: An Arrest Is Made in Road Shootings
headline.print_headline: An Arrest Is Made in Road Shootings
